content: अव्याज {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Free from guile or fraud. --जः, --जं {@--1@} Absence of guile or fraud, honesty. {@--2@} Simplicity, artlessness; <ab>oft.</ab> in <ab>comp.</ab> with सुंदर, मनोहर &c. in the sense of ‘artlessly’, ‘naturally’; इदं किलाव्याजमनोहरं वपुः <ls>Ś. 1. 18</ls>; <ls>M. 2. 14</ls>; °रमणीयं प्रेम <ls>K. 175.</ls>
